CustomField.description: If "Create Opportunity From Checkout" is enabled, if the checkout was submitted to pay later, the Opportunity will be created with this Stage Name, such as Prospecting. Must be spelled exactly to match.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If "Create Opportunity From Checkout" is enabled, if the checkout was submitted to pay later, the Opportunity will be created with this Stage Name, such as Prospecting. Must be spelled exactly to match.
CustomField.label: Opportunity Open Stage Name
